name: Requiem: En mordgåta på 1600-talet
storyline: Have you ever wanted to travel through time? Or step into another person and see the world as they do? The original game Requiem takes you to 17th century Sweden, to a stunning replica of Ekenäs Castle. You are thrown into an exciting murder mystery - and you are the victim! As a restless spirit, you can inhabit other people's bodies. Through the eyes of the other castle inhabitants, you experience reality, immerse yourself in the mystery, and search for your murderer. You will not rest until the mystery is solved...
